TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ValidatorDisplay extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定在驗證控制項中錯誤訊息的顯示行為。

span.span: Specifies the display behavior of error messages in validation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉，代表在驗證控制項中的錯誤訊息的不同的顯示行為。The enumeration represents the different display behaviors of error messages in validation controls. 無指定您只想顯示中的錯誤訊息控制項。None specifies that you only want to display the error message in a control. 錯誤訊息不會驗證控制項中顯示。The error message will not display in the validation control. 靜態指定您不要的網頁，即可驗證程式控制項顯示的錯誤訊息時，變更版面配置。Static specifies that you don't want the layout of the Web page to change when validator controls display error messages. 顯示網頁時，網頁上的空間配置的錯誤訊息。Space on the page is allocated for the error messages when displaying the page. 驗證程式內容屬於實際的頁面。因此，在相同的輸入控制項的多個驗證必須佔用頁面上的不同位置。The validator contents are physically part of the page; therefore, multiple validators for the same input control must occupy different locations on the page. 動態指定您想要以動態方式將錯誤訊息放在網頁上，驗證失敗時。Dynamic specifies that you want to dynamically place error messages on the Web page when validation fails. 在頁面上; 未配置空間，讓驗證內容因此，頁面會動態變更顯示錯誤訊息。Space for the validation content is not allocated on the page; therefore, the page dynamically changes to display the error message. 這可讓多個共用相同的實體位置在頁面上的驗證。This allows multiple validators to share the same physical location on the page. 若要保留的頁面版面配置變更時，會顯示錯誤訊息，包含驗證器的 HTML 項目必須調整大小，大到足以容納驗證程式的大小上限。In order to keep the page layout from changing when an error message is displayed, the HTML element containing the validator must be sized large enough to accommodate the maximum size of the validator. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定驗證控制項，讓它們產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure validation controls so that they generate markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay Dynamic = int32(2)

summary.span: 當驗證失敗時，驗證器內容會動態加入網頁。

span.span: Validator content dynamically added to the page when validation fails.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay None = int32(0)

summary.span: 驗證器內容絕不內嵌顯示。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay Static = int32(1)

summary.span: 驗證器內容實體上為網頁配置的一部分。

span.span: Validator content physically part of the page layout.
